name: Snow Wolf Shooting: Wildlife Hunter
description:
Hunt the wild wolf pack on your own and become the undisputed snow wolf hunter. The exciting and challenging deadly snow wolf hunting trophy is on the line with snow shooting: wildlife hunter is the hunting game for you!
Snow Wolf Shooting: Wildlife Hunter is an Amazing wolf hunting simulator game with incredibly gorgeous wolf textures to choose from and powerful attacks to execute.
You have to plan and execute hunt this wild animal and sharpen your wild shooting skills. Go on hunting and look for your next action target mission to enjoy the trace. Enjoy this shooting season in a beautiful Snow Forest Environment.
Wild Wolf Hunting Challenge has an awesome combination of RPG, Action-Adventure and Simulation elements. Kill the wolves for your survival or otherwise wolves bite you down. Shoot, shoot until all wolves are down.
Snow Wolf Shooting: Wildlife Hunting you’ll be able to experience the thrill of fighting beasts with real shooting elements & stunning powerful attack. Stay safe and protect yourself from dangerous wolves.

Game Features:
Easy and Effective Touch Control
Amazing sounds effects
Efficient Weapon Control and Zoom system
Realistic wolf hunting simulator First Person Shooting (FPS).
Amazing 3D Snow Environment.
Deadly challenges
